EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Migrating from Classic HTML to TBox - German - 2015.10.06.Email - Last
EmailTemplate.subject: Nutzen Sie die Chance und melden Sie sich jetzt an! Webinar „Migrating: HTML to X-Browser“ (German)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Let It Go: Migrating from Classic HTML to TBox
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
The TBox engine helps to easily automate all types of applications, making end-to-end testing stress-free and effortless. Ensure that you are up to date with latest and fastest test automation out on the market and migrate your old Classic HTML engine over to the TBox engine.
Join our webinar “Migrating from Classic HTML to TBox” to where Tricentis product manager, Mike Nemeth, will show you how to:
- Seamlessly migrate over from Classic HTML to TBox - Re-use test assets across all browsers and mobile devices - Use TBox as a powerful tool for automation
Register now <http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/let-it-go-migrating-from-classic-html-to-tbox?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> for the free webinar on October 6th, 2015, at 4:00 PM CEST. See you there!
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/let-it-go-migrating-from-classic-html-to-tbox?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/let-it-go-migrating-from-classic-html-to-tbox?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
Tue, Oct 6, 2015 4:00 p.m. – 5:00 p.m. CEST 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. EST
Mike Nemeth Product Manager Tricentis
